name: West Boutique Hotel Tel Aviv

reviews.text: Each year I treat my growing family to a few nights at the beach. After one disappointing and one abysmal stay at the Daniel Herzliya Hotel I set our sites for Tel Aviv. And my review of the West Boutique Hotel is FANTASTIC! We were five adults and seven children - children 10 and under in three rooms.
reviews.title: A great hotel experience will go back

reviews.text: The hotel is new, fresh and clean. The front desk staff was friendly and efficient. Two of the three rooms were available before 3pm check in (we arrived at 1pm). The third room was available promptly at 3pm.
reviews.title: Skip this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool is fantastic! It is large with plenty of lounge chairs. The deep end is no deeper than five feet. Which is very accommodating to all. And their is also a kiddie pool. Best of all the West Boutique is the only hotel you see. So you get a lot of sun and do not feel crowded by other hotels.
reviews.title: Not recommended at all!!!

reviews.text: To get to the beach you got out of the front door and walk around the hotel. They charge you 7NIS for entry which is reimbursed by the hotel. Convenient and accommodating.
reviews.title: A good hotel near Tel-Aviv beach

reviews.text: I liked the rooms. They are "boutique style". Tile floor instead of carpet. Which I believe is cleaner. Because it is a suite hotel there is a full kitchen, disguised handily behind drawers and cabinets. Even the fridge is behind a door. And the wood used throughout is zebra wood. Very cool. The balcony was spacious. We had kids in pull out beds in every room and did not feel cramped. I especially liked the bedrooms. Small and comfy.
reviews.title: Everything I hoped for
Wonderful staff!!! Great hotel!!! Can't wait to return
reviews.text: All the staff in this hotel are really friendly, and make you feel very welcome. The best in Israel. Having stayed in hotels all over Israel over a period of 26 years I do not say this lightly.
Ayelet and Rivital on the reception deserve a special mention for making the stay so memorable.
reviews.title: Great Hotel Amazing Suites
Amazing !!! Highly recommended.
reviews.text: The hotel is located 10 mins drive north of central Tel Aviv and 10 mins south of Herziliya- meaning you get the best of both worlds. Peace and serenity and a lovely beach, but the hustle and bustle of the city just minutes away.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Parking is a dream. So easy and free.
reviews.title: too expensive, bad service, far away from center
Wonderful Experience -- "I'll be back"
reviews.text: The rooms are brand new and very comfortable. The views from the bedrooms are not fantastic, but the higher up you are the more likely you will be able to see the sea.
We went as a family party of eight, including two young children age 4 and 7,
reviews.title: A really FANTASTIC Hotel!

reviews.text: And we Thoroughly enjoyed it, it was a real holiday .the staff were all fantastic , the atmosphere was fantastic,the bedrooms, lounges, restaurant , swimming pool, ample easy to use car park,the food,EVERYTHING fantastic ... This is not an exaggeration , it really was the best holiday, because of this hotel and it's staff, we have ever experienced.Would we stay there again? You bet! That was a REAL holiday !
reviews.title: Nice modern hotel, but a little far out for business

reviews.text: Signed......Dennis Gore U.K.
reviews.title: Too expensive, no convenience store nearby & far away from downtown Tel Aviv

reviews.text: Hotel looks to be brand new, smart entrance with reception and restaurant. This immediately has the feel of a holiday hotel, as from reception you look out on the pool area. I was a little dissapointed to hear that the pool was only open until 5PM, but I was not here for a relaxing swim.
reviews.title: too expensive, need to urgently clean rooms and improve service

reviews.text: The hotel is next to the beach, but from the pool area, you wouldnt know it. There is what appears to be a large man-made ridge of soil that totally blocks out any views of the sea from ground level. Is this an attempt of privacy? I would have preferred to be able to see the beach from the ground. Accessing the beach is also not direct, you will have to walk out of the front of the hotel and about 200 meters around a currently unfinished building site to reach the entrance.
reviews.title: Major improvements

reviews.text: Everything in this hotel is up-to-date and very contemporary. Comfortalbe and quiet and well run. Just a few minutes from the lively scenes of Tel Aviv. Not to be missed!
reviews.title: Very smart and peaceful facing a lovely beach.

reviews.text: One bedroom flats with a large balcony and fridge as well as microwave are included. That means you can save some calories and shekels taking some of the meals in your own "home" away from home.
reviews.title: Very good small hotel

reviews.text: We stayed for two nights very recently . Two rooms - two couples with children sharing with parents .Hotel has excellent staff ( polite , helpful ) and excellent parking.We considered its location -by car five minutes to Herztlyia and 15 minutes to Tel Aviv - ideal . Close enough but quiet and convenient - car essential
reviews.title: Yes! Finally a good hotel in Tel Aviv

reviews.text: The hotel is modern and crisp and we found rooms and public areas very clean, pool and pool area - excellent .More than adequate gym
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: Rooms are well designed with adequate kitchen facilities , quite spacious , comfortable design (except the bed) good TVs . Good shower and plentiful hot water. Breakfast ( included ) was very good .
reviews.title: Decent hotel; Good breakfast, far, pool empty & bad internet

description: A unique blend of city and sea, West, All Suite Hotel is a haven of sophistication and convenience, located on the shores of one of Tel Aviv’s most exclusive and tranquil beaches. Featuring 65 suites of the highest quality, the West hotel provides the ideal escape from the non-stop action of the city while remaining close to Tel Aviv’s business, leisure and tourist centers.
